snippet: Mr. Anderson fenced for England in the Olympics, created some of Hollywood’s greatest sword fights with actors from Errol Flynn to Antonio Banderas, and appeared on-screen himself as Darth Vader.
abstract: Bob Anderson, sword master who fenced for England in the Olympics and later became sword fight choreographer for Hollywood, eventually appearing as Darth Vader in original Star Wars trilogy, dies at age 89.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Anderson fenced for England in the Olympics, created some of Hollywood’s greatest sword fights with actors from Errol Flynn to Antonio Banderas, and appeared on-screen himself as Darth Vader.

headline.seo: Bob Anderson, Sword-Fight Choreographer, Dies at 89
headline.main: Bob Anderson, Sword Master, Dies at 89
headline.print_headline: Bob Anderson, Sword Master, Dies at 89
